item.description: Hi there - Deb Lavoy is involved in sponsoring a breakfast speaker series (by opentext social workplace), and has some seats left for Andrew McAfee (Enterprise 2.0 author) talk tomorrow morning at 8am. Location is The Westin Copley Place 10 Huntington Avenue, and it's free. I thought our group might find it interesting. All the details, etc are on the eventbrite invite here: http://mcafee-purpose...  and do register at eventbrite as well as RSVP here on meetup so we can see level of interest in this type of event, thanks!
item.name: Andrew McAffee Breakfast presentation
